name: TagosGreen Business Community
tag_list: sustainability-experts, green-experts, environmentally-preferred-products, green-consultants, green-tools-and-metrics, sustainability-tools, white-papers, green-products-catalog, sustainability-related-business-objectives, sustainability-concepts, strateg
overview:
The TagosGreen™ Business Community brings together sustainability experts and industry professionals into a forum to actively discuss sustainability concepts, strategies and operational methods that result in real environmental improvements. Its team of experts understands the corporate issues surrounding environmental concerns. They understand the need to be socially responsible but more notably, they understand the need for more than theory to accomplish sustainability-related business objectives. TagosGreen experts understand what the marketplace is demanding and is positioned to help address the need to bring a plan to reality.

TagosGreen™ Business Community offers a broad selection of: Green Consultants in more than 30 areas to support your green initiatives

Green Tools to improve your analysis and quantification of your company’s sustainability efforts

Discussion Boards to exchange ideas and search for answers eRoundtables that include both live and recorded group discussions around topical areas

Whitepapers/Documents from leading professionals and educational organizations

Greener Products Catalog offering a consolidated purchasing center for certified greener products

Calendar of community and industry related events Weekly Community Features regarding green business programs and opportunities

Community News Flashes covering latest trends, events, and activities specific to your topic area

Training and Education providing on-demand webinars, eLectures, Podcasts

On-Demand Accreditation Programs designed and presented by industry experts
